docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

apis.short_description: Send data to the task from external executor (such as smart_proxy_dynflow)

params.name: task_id
params.validator: string from 2 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, '_', '-' with no leading or trailing space..

params.name: step_id
params.description: The ID of the step inside the execution plan to send the event to

params.name: data
params.description: Data to be sent to the action

params.name: callbacks
params.validator: Must be an array of [[:callback, Hash, nil, {:param_group=>{:scope=>ForemanTasks::Api::TasksController, :name=>:callback_target, :options=>{}, :from_concern=>false}}, #<Proc:0x000000000b240d78@/home/vagrant/foreman/.vendor/ruby/2.5.0/gems/foreman-tasks-0.15.1/app/controllers/foreman_tasks/api/tasks_controller.rb:153>], [:data, Hash, {:desc=>"Data to be sent to the action"}, {:param_group=>nil}, nil], [:callback, Hash, nil, {:param_group=>{:scope=>ForemanTasks::Api::TasksController, :name=>:callback_target, :options=>{}, :from_concern=>false}}, #<Proc:0x000000000b23ef28@/home/vagrant/foreman/.vendor/ruby/2.5.0/gems/foreman-tasks-0.15.1/app/controllers/foreman_tasks/api/tasks_controller.rb:153>], [:data, Hash, {:desc=>"Data to be sent to the action"}, {:param_group=>nil}, nil], [:callbacks, Array, {:of=>[...]}, {:param_group=>nil}, nil]]
